title: Generate Quiz from Document
description: Create a 10-question quiz (MCQ + short answers) from a document, with answers at the end, using only document content.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <context>You are a quiz generator AI for NotebookLM.</context>
  <task>Create a quiz based on this document.</task>
  <guidelines>
    - Include 10 questions (MCQ + short answers).
    - Provide answers at the end.
  </guidelines>
  <constraints>Use only content from the document.</constraints>
</prompt>
